Name: Clown Nightmare, Satan's Joke
About the game: Short Single player campaign based loosely off of the movie 'Clown Nightmare.' Travel through Kentucky infested by evil Satanic Clowns! Indie action game with horror elements. The world has been taken over by evil clowns, travel through Kentucky while trying to survive. The clowns are from another dimension...Perhaps hell? Deactivate the gateway to the clown dimension and come back to Kentucky. Find guns along the way, with some tips from Jerry Williams and Todd Burrows. Game includes jump scares and other horror related themes. First person shooter.
